backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the AI-Enhanced Student Feedback System backend with student management, submission tracking, and rule-based feedback/score generation stored in persistent maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (visual theme, submission interface, student dashboard, instructor panel) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of one-line summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose of every component, page, hook, and config file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with four routes (Home, Submit, Dashboard, Admin) wrapped in a shared Layout with Navigation, Footer, and Sonner Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AddStudentForm.t: Form component for adding new students with name, student ID, and course fields, including validation, loading state, and inline success/error messages via the useAddStudent mutation.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Reusable landing-page card displaying an icon, title, and description with configurable amber/teal/green accent color variants and a hover scale animation.
Component that renders AI-generated feedback results including a color-coded score badge, feedback paragraph, and a numbered improvement suggestions list using shadcn Card components.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with the SmartFeedback brand logo, navigation links, and a copyright attribution linking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with desktop and mobile-responsive menus, active link highlighting, and a 'Submit Work' CTA button.
frontend/src/components/StudentTable.tsx: Displays a table of students with their submission count and average score fetched per-row, plus View and Delete action buttons.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionCard.t: Card component showing a single feedback submission with its score badge and an expandable section for feedback text and suggestions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity persistence, and status tracking via an AuthClient-backed React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for CRUD operations on students, submissions, feedback generation, and student stats against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Sora fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a warm Amber + Teal design token palette (light and dark modes) along with reusable component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with TanStack QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page displaying a hero section with CTA buttons, a feature highlights grid (AI analysis, instant feedback, progress tracking), and platform stats.
frontend/src/pages/InstructorPanel.tsx: Instructor admin page that lists all students with aggregate stats, supports selecting a student to view their submissions and feedback, and includes a delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard page where users enter their Student ID to view all their submissions, received feedback, and summary stats like total submissions and average score.
frontend/src/pages/StudentSubmission.tsx: Assignment submission page with a form for Student ID, assignment title, and submission text that triggers backend calls to create a submission and generate AI feedback, then displays the result.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining dark mode, custom color tokens (using oklch CSS variables), typography, border radius, box shadows, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state including version, summary, architectural notes, image requirements, and a list of existing implemented features for the AI-enhanced student feedback platform.
